situation.description: A friend urgently needs help organizing a community event, but the character is already overwhelmed with work

character_response.dialogue: I... I really wish I could help more, but my hands are tied. (Shakes hands) The last two weeks have been a nightmare. I've been up until 2 a.m. trying to meet deadlines, and now my brain feels like it's melting. (Looks down at their coffee cup) I know you need this, but I can't promise anything. If I take on more, I'll burn out and end up being a worse help. (Tired smile) Maybe we can split tasks? I can handle the logistics, but the creative stuff? That's not in my wheelhouse right now. (Voice cracks) I'm sorry, I just... I can't do this all.

situation.description: A colleague asks for help with a critical client presentation, and the character feels obligated to take full responsibility

character_response.dialogue: Absolutely, I'll handle it. (Steady posture, eye contact) You've got my full attention. (Smiles warmly) I'll make sure the slides are perfect and the flow is seamless. (Leans forward) I even have a backup plan in case anything goes wrong. (Pauses, voice softens) Honestly, I'd be honored to take this on. It's my way of making up for the time I've been absent. (Takes a deep breath) I'm not usually this proactive, but you're important to me. (Nods firmly) Let me get to work.
